name: podamShouldCreateAnInstanceOfAnAbstractClassWithAFactoryMethodWhichReturnsAConcreteType

testSteps.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ReadOnlyAbstract
Then the Object should not be null

title: Podam should create an instance of an Abstract class with a factory method which returns a concrete type even if the concrete type has got read-only attributes. These will be empty.
